replies.author: Ben_Jian
replies.txt_content:
标题: [1.7.10/1.10.2][ANGRY PIXEL][The Betweenlands Mod--交错次元mod]在新维度里探索 本帖最后由 Ben_Jian 于 2017-6-17 10:30 编辑 
这是一个与以太同等级的mod
mod非常大，居然有72MB
它添加了一个新的世界，新的方块，武器，boss，地形

这个mod的特点是什么？[iron_ingot]独特的世界生成-给你一个丰富的沼泽历险体验[gold_ingot]多样的怪物-你打都打不完[redstone_dust]美丽的天空-给你一个魔幻的感受[diamond_gem]独特的boss挑战机制-享受战斗的乐趣

我可以在这个世界里做什么？[wood_sword]进行挖矿，挖取矿物并制作装备[stone_sword]使用你的建筑才能配合里面多姿多彩的方块进行建筑[iron_sword]不断杀怪，追求欲望[gold_sword]进行探索，了解mod的流程并研究mod的机械[diamond_sword]挑战boss-享受这个mod独特的boss挑战机制


关于转载（我不知道算不算允许）我的问题与作者回答




转载问题.png (119.65 KB, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

2016-7-15 13:29 上传












转载回答.png (99.11 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2016-7-15 13:36 上传






原文介绍：


[spoiler]The Betweenlands is a mod developed by the Angry Pixel modding group for the indie sandbox construction game, Minecraft. This large and expansive mod focuses on a whole new fully fleshed-out dimension for Minecraft with a plethora of exciting new content that offers a totally independent survival experience. 

The Betweenlands dimension is a dark, swampy realm crawling with strange, monstrous creatures. It is the dimension that the majority of the mod revolves around.
Features include -






















A complete independent survival experience with hours of gameplayA whole new dimension to survive inMany new creatures and monsters to fightBosses to defeatPlenty of unique biomes and structures to explore and loot, from towering fortresses to scattered underground ruinsAn extensive herblore system that allows you to create over 30 unique infusions from 14 different aspects found in plantsA unique farming system with several new crop typesOver 300 new blocks to build with, including various machine blocks and a whole lot of plant lifeOver 350 new items, including lots of unique weapons and loot, complete tool and armour sets, plenty of food items, new raw materials, scraps of lore and moreOver 250 new sounds, including 7 immersive ambient tracks and 33 music tracksLots of new mechanics, including food sickness, corrosion of tools, decay of the player, and a combat circle revolving around 3 new gem itemsRandomly occuring events, including changes in the weather as well as sometimes more supernatural occurrencesSpecial built-in custom shader effects to make the worlds look even prettierMultiplayer compatibility so you can survive with your friends...and much, more more!

Lore - During the time when the Overworld and Nether were just being born, this dimension existed as little other than a void of nothingness, but energy seeped into it, giving it potential to grow. Eventually, an interdimensional rift appeared, allowing life force to populate this dimension. A race of NPCs inhabited it, including Revil O' Elcanrab, a powerful Druid. He and his followers worked to twist the Nether's evil into a weapon of peace. However, when they opened the portal in this dimension, evil surged out into it. This caused the NPCs to become Wights. Revil O' Elcanrab himself became the Prime Wight, and he now wielded power over this dimension. He caused the Betweenlands to become a swampy, deathly land, as it is now. After much time, a traveler (the player) found their way to the dimension.
Features - The air is so foul that any creature breathing it slowly decays.  The realm has no day/night cycle.  Clocks, maps, redstone, flint and steel, and compasses are useless here. Due to the warm and wet environment of The Betweenlands, food from other dimensions rots when traveling through the portal to this dimension, becoming Rotten Food.As Flint and Steel cannot operate in the dimension, there is an alternative way to creating a fire. Simply hold right-click Moss, Cave Moss, or Thorns (either placed or dropped, both block and item forms work) with an Octine Ingot to light it on fire. The ingot will cause the plant to slowly build up flame until it turns into a fire block, without consuming the ingot in the process. This is essential for getting an Infuserstarted.Torches will not work here, and you will require Sulfur Torches instead. Along with that, tools from other dimensions will be diminished in effectiveness in the Betweenlands, prompting the player to use the Betweenlands tools. However, Betweenlands tools in your inventory will undergo Corrosion.
How to access - The Betweenlands can be accessed by creating a Portal Tree, which contains four portals to the dimension. For more information on how to access the dimension, visit the How to get there page.
Environment - The Betweenlands revolves around a swampy-like theme. It has a randomly generated, animated green sky dotted with mysterious, hazy stars. These skies have Auroras from time to time, one of the last sparks of happiness in the dimension. The once verdant soil retains a very dead green color.The dimension is composed of Swamplands, Patchy Islands, Coarse Islands, Sludge Plains,Deep Waters, and Marshes. The Middle Gem Ores can be found within a couple of these biomes. These biomes are crawling with very thick and uncontrolled flora and fauna, and some contain remnants of long lost civilizations in the form of Small Ruins, Dungeons, and Idol Head Statues, among other mysterious structures. There is one rare major dungeon landmark, the Wight Fortress, that is central to progression. The Betweenlands may give birth to new biomes in the future and will receive more structures, such as Tribe Settlements.The Lake Caverns, or Pitstone layer of The Betweenlands. It houses Valonite Ore, and Life Crystal Ore.The Betweenlands's default tree is the small Weedwood Tree, although there are bigger variations. The dimensions also provides Sap Trees, Rubber Trees, and Dead Trees. More trees are to come in the future.
The dimension carries a whole underground system with ores such as Sulfur Ore,Slimy Bone Ore, Octine Ore, Syrmorite Ore, Valonite Ore, and Life Crystal Ore. The caves themselves are often wide and house underground flora and dripping stalactites, along with echoing cave ambiance.There are two main locations of the Betweenlands's underground structure: The Caverns and the Lake Caverns.The Betweenlands only has two underground structures at the moment, and those are the Tar Dungeon, located in the Caverns layer, and the Underground Ruins, located in the Lake Caverns layer. Ancient Temples and more will be arriving in the future.

游戏图片地形环境




游戏视频（如何开端）
官方视频宣传http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTY0NDkzMDIyOA==.html
关于教程视频youtube上有很多，我最近几天会抽空去搬运的



mod下载！原帖下载吧1.10.2：https://addons-origin.cursecdn.com/files/2415/767/TheBetweenlands-2.0.3-alpha-universal.jar1.7.10自行原帖


关于游戏语言有英文和德语但是没有中文关于汉化文本：Github已有汉化文本.指...https://github.com/ExtraMeteorP/Betweenlands_ChineseLocalization1.7.10用的版主汉化  
关于教程国内没有教程不过youtube上教程很多，大家可以去看看
关于服务器使用可以使用但是世界很大，可能会卡服加了汉化文本之后服务器使用不了，请注意
关于授权这一点我在这边不得不申明一下了已经有盗版网站转载这个Mod了

replies.txt_content: 你好，我是一个刚刚开始做Minecraft视频的小小up主，这个mod和其他异世界mod兼容性比较差，和暮色与金沙世界加了以后对原来的世界生成有一定的几率发生错误，但是错开加入mod的顺序和进入地图的顺序可以在莫方面避免掉，还有这个mod和光影也好像有一些问题，这些是我在直播和自己测试的时候发现的，我想做这个模组的解说希望以后多多帮助。

replies.author: 奈亚涅普恩
replies.txt_content: 是个很不错的mod，内容很丰富，只是还没有汉化，等吧{:10_492:}

一个完整的独立的生存经验,小时的游戏
生存在一个全新的维度
许多新的动物和怪物战斗
老板打败
许多独特的生物群落结构探索和战利品,从高耸的堡垒分散地下废墟
一个广泛herblore系统,允许你创建超过30独特的植物中注入来自14个不同方面
一个独特的农业系统和几个新的作物类型
超过300个新街区建设,包括各种机器块和很多植物
超过350个新项目,其中包括许多独特的武器和战利品,完整的工具和盔甲,充足的食物,新原材料,残渣传说等等
超过250个新的声音,包括7身临其境的环境足迹和33首音乐
许多新的力学,包括食品疾病、腐蚀的工具,衰变的球员,和一个战斗圈围绕3个新的宝石项
随机发生的事件,包括天气的变化以及有时更超自然现象
特殊内置定制材质效果让世界看起来更漂亮
多人游戏的兼容性和你的朋友所以你可以生存
…多,更多!
传说,
时Overworld虚空刚刚出生,这个维度存在少除了空洞的虚无,但能量渗入它,给它潜在的增长。最终,超空间裂缝出现,让生命力量来填充这个维度。一个npc的种族居住,包括Revil O ' Elcanrab,一个强大的德鲁伊。他和他的追随者在扭曲虚空的邪恶的武器和平。然而,当他们打开了门户在这个维度,邪恶的涌出。这使npc变成幽魂。Revil O ' Elcanrab自己成为了怀特岛,和他现在掌握权力在这个维度。他导致Betweenlands成为沼泽,死亡的土地,像今日一样。多少时间后,一个旅行者(玩家)找到了维度。
功能-
空气是如此的犯规,任何生物的呼吸慢慢衰减。领域没有日夜循环。时钟,地图,雷石东,弗林特和钢,罗盘是无用的。由于Betweenlands的温暖和潮湿的环境,食物从其他维度腐烂旅行时通过门户这个维度,成为腐烂的食物。
弗林特和钢不能操作维度,有另一种方法可以创建一个火。仅仅持有右键单击苔藓、洞穴苔藓或荆棘(放置或下降,两块工作和项目形式)与一个Octine锭光它着火了。钢锭将导致植物慢慢建立火焰,直到它变成一个火块,在这个过程中不消耗锭。这对得到一个Infuserstarted至关重要。
火把将不会在这里工作,你将需要硫火把。以及,工具与其他维度Betweenlands将降低效率,促使玩家使用Betweenlands工具。然而,Betweenlands工具在你的库存将进行腐蚀。
如何访问-
可以通过创建一个门户访问Betweenlands树,其中包含四个维度门户。如何访问维度上的更多信息,访问页面如何到达那里。
环境-
Betweenlands围绕swampy-like主题。它有一个随机生成的,动画绿色的天空点缀着神秘,朦胧的星星。这些天空不时有极光,最后幸福的火花维度。曾经翠绿的土壤保留一个死去的绿色。
尺寸由湿地、片状群岛、粗岛屿,污泥平原,深水和沼泽。中间的宝石矿石可以找到的这些生物群落。这些生物群落爬行很厚和不受控制的动植物,和一些含有残余的失去文明的形式小废墟,地牢,和偶像头雕像等神秘的结构。有一个罕见的大地牢地标,怀特岛的堡垒,这是发展的核心。Betweenlands可能生出新的生物群落在未来将得到更多的结构,如部落定居点。
湖洞穴或Pitstone Betweenlands的层。这房子Valonite矿石,和生命水晶矿石。
Betweenlands的默认树小Weedwood树,虽然有大的变化。尺寸还提供Sap树、橡胶树、和死树。在未来将会有更多的树。
整个维度进行地下系统等矿石的硫矿石,泥泞的骨矿,Octine矿石,Syrmorite矿石,Valonite矿石,和生命水晶矿石。洞穴本身往往是宽,房子地下植物和滴钟乳石,连同呼应洞穴氛围。
有两种主要的位置Betweenlands的地下结构:在湖边的洞穴,洞穴。
Betweenlands只有两个地下结构,这些焦油地牢,位于洞穴层,地下遗址,位于湖洞穴层。古老的寺庙和更多在未来将会到达。
不明覺厲

replies.author: fgfgfgfg
replies.txt_content:
总的来说还是个开发不太完全的Mod→_→可玩性不错，可是有待提高
从很多地方都能看出借鉴其他Mod的影子，比如以太那不能插普通火把的设定，还有Boss的血条和专属的战斗领域都有满满的以太风。Boss的部分感觉有一定的暮色元素。总的来说是集大成者，只不过是个未完全体。
另外很多人都说光影有问题→_→我猜测会不会是萤火虫的问题，如果你直视萤火虫就会出现"亮瞎眼"的这种特效。
最后还是默默地哀悼一下以太Mod，最新更新以后完全没落了，随机的抽奖系统甚至可以抽出信标......可玩性瞬间爆炸，最近几次也没有什么实质性增强

replies.author: fgfgfgfg
replies.txt_content:
Ben_Jian 发表于 2016-7-29 13:45
作者还在持续更新，话说boss血条是原创的应该还好吧
最近的几次体验的话可以感受到很多同元素的东西，不过还是相当有创新力的
比如进入沼泽除沼泽本地食物外其他的全部食物都会腐烂，但是吃本地食物过多会根据次数削弱饱食度的回复
很明显这里参考了生活调味料Mod
不得不说这个Mod作者野心很大，想把很多东西加进去，可是这需要很强的把控力。希望这个Mod不要玩火自焚了。
另外血条以太就有哦→_→以太不只有血条还有二重形态，估计这个Mod以后也会加进去。
最后作者的3D建模有点惨不忍睹什么的，希望他能改进一下吧
